resources.string: Find what people say about someone you are curious about.
Add a new review of someone you know
Those you interact with will never know your identity
Continue with your google account to get started.
1. To avoid random strangers reviewing you, we use your phone number as a private key so that only those who know it can write you reviews. It is NOT exposed to or shared with anyone.
2. If you Do not provide your phone, Anyone who knows your name will be able to write you reviews.
Lock chat but but stay here
Lock and move to hidden chats
An image helps visualy identify the target
NOTE: Please confirm the phone numbers as their exact match of each will be used to link the target\'s reviews. Country code Inclusive.
Step 2 : Check if %s exists in the database
User\'s profile picture and details will be saved as default for this review.
What is the main topic or theme of your review? \n eg. Eating habits, Bed performance, Cooking skills
